Translations.Text: Ki niscitaca ha samuha atisaya kami sankhyeta ahe
Ani tyavara he amhala phara krodhita karita aheta
Ani nihsansaya, amhi mothya sankhyeta ahota, tyancyapasuna savadha rahanare
Sevati amhi tyanna bagammadhuna va jharyammadhuna bahera kadhale
Ani khajin'yammadhuna ani cangalya cangalya thikanammadhuna
Asa prakare jhale, ani amhi tya (sarva vastum) ca varasa isra'ilacya santatila banavile
Yastava phira'aunace anuyayi surya ugavataca tyanca pathalaga karanyasa nighale
Yasathi jevha doghanni ekamekanna pahile tevha musace sathidara mhanale, amhi tara khatrine pakadita alo
(Hajarata musa) mhanale, kadapi nahi. Visvasa rakha, majha raba (palanakarta) majhya sobatila ahe. Jo jarura mala marga dakhavila
Amhi musakade vahayi (prakasana) pathavili ki samudracya panyavara apalya kathica prahara kara tevha tyaca ksani samudra dubhangala ani pratyeka his'sa panyacya mothya parvata'itaka jhala
Ani amhi tyaca thikani dusaryanna javala anuna ubhe kele
Ani musa ani tyancya sarva sathidaranna mukti pradana keli
Nihsansaya, yata phara motha bodha ahe ani tyancyapaiki adhikansa loka imana rakhanare nahita
Ani nihsansaya tumaca palanakarta motha varcasvasali ani daya karanara ahe
